articles.description: When the review embargo lifted on 'Cyberpunk 2077' many reviewers were disappointed by what CD Projekt Red delivered. When critics gave their honest opinions, they bombarded by hateful and threatening messages, particularly women.
articles.content:
Reviewing the latest and greatest video games before theyre released is a dream job for anyone who grew up enchanted by the glow of a computer monitor or console. 
Thats a dream thats quickly shatte… [+6851 chars]

articles.title: Why another national lockdown in England might be needed in February 2021 - Wales Online
articles.description: The winter months are a high-pressure period for the NHS at the best of times
articles.content: England recently emerged from a four-week lockdown into a series of tiered restrictions, and there is good news about the authorisation of the first vaccine for COVID-19, which is starting to be depl… [+5350 chars]
